content.raw:
unlike the gui tests, the visual tests are executed in a separate thread from the main rendering thread hence they have been giving weird problems.

To fix this, we would need to change ServerFixture, which would then affect many tests. It probably needs to be done in a separate pull request and have it tested.
content.html:
unlike the gui tests, the visual tests are executed in a separate thread from the main rendering thread hence they have been giving weird problems.

To fix this, we would need to change ServerFixture, which would then affect many tests. It probably needs to be done in a separate pull request and have it tested.
